name: Bridgeline Software
overview: Bridgeline Software, Inc. engages in the development of Web application management software and Web applications in the United States. It offers Web application development services that include various Web development solutions, such as information architecture and usability engineering, interface configuration, Web application development, rich media, e-commerce, e-learning and e-training, search engine optimization, and content management. The company also provides various managed services, such as retained professional services and hosting services. In addition, it offers 24/7 application monitoring, emergency response, version control, load balancing, managed firewall security, and virus protection services, as well as shared hosting, dedicated hosting, and SaaS hosting services. Further, Bridgeline Software provides various Web application management software products, including iAPPS, a suite of products, including Content Management, Analytics, Commerce, and Marketier. The iAPPS framework allows application development teams to develop Web applications based on analyzing and optimizing customersâ€™ business processes, and then map the results to a common software component solution. Additionally, it offers Orgitecture, a suite of on-demand software-as-a-service Web-based tools designed to streamline Web site management and reduce Web-related development costs; Base 10, which provides customers with a suite of on-demand Web-based tools that provides integrated content management, e-marketing management, and e-commerce; and PowerShop, which offers customers with e-commerce capabilities.
